text: The Gilgitâ€“Baltistan United Movement (GBUM) is a political movement of Gilgit Baltistan based in Skardu. It demands a fully autonomous state consisting of Gilgit Agency and Baltistan.Gilgit-Baltistan leaders reject Musharraf's empowerment package, Asian News International, November 2, 2007 The GBUM states that it should be given the status of an "Independent Constitutional Assembly" and given similar rights granted to the existing Azad Kashmir Legislative Assembly. == References == Category:Political parties in Kashmir
title: Gilgit-Baltistan United Movement
